task: Input: processed MERFISH AnnData (mouse brain). Using expression-only data from the processed MERFISH mouse brain AnnData, perform one-vs-all t-test differential expression per cluster (logFC > 0, adj p ≤ 0.05), rank genes by logFC then −log₁₀(p_adj), convert to uppercase gene symbols (deduplicate, remove Ensembl IDs), identify clusters expressing oligodendrocyte precursor cell markers, and return the combined oligodendrocyte precursor cell marker genes in top genes from those oligodendrocyte precursor cell clusters as cell_types_predicted.

scoring.description: Pass if Jaccard ≥ 0.29 (≥80% overlap with 2 GT markers using top-7).
